seats_honda_accord_2008: engine performance lacks punch after 60, head rest are poor design, lacks driver seat memory rear seat a c, radio system is marginal compared to bose, seats are hard and small for a large person.
performance_honda_accord_2008: engine performance lacks punch after 60, head rest are poor design, lacks driver seat memory rear seat a c, radio system is marginal compared to bose, seats are hard and small for a large person.
price_amazon_kindle: the selection of inexpensive books has been worth the purchase price of this item especially for those that enjoy reading the classics or nationwide news. i will say, the selection of inexpensive books has been worth the purchase price of this item especially for those that enjoy reading the classics or nationwide news.
location_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the location was perfect, a short walk to the cable cars or bus lines, a safeway grocery and walgreens drugs is across the street. 00, however that being said if you are used to staying at true kimpton hotels this will leave you wanting.
features_windows7: i personally can't tell what positives it offers still, but it's still a nifty upgrade with a lot of nifty features over xp that make for a more fun experience for some, and a more organized experience involving navigating huge catacombs of archives and files.
speed_windows7: windows 7 is quite simply faster, more stable, boots faster, goes to sleep faster, manages your files better and on top of that it's beautiful to look at and easy to use.
navigation_amazon_kindle: amazon is asking publishers to adhere to a standard of navigation to support these features. but amazon does not have the manpower to review each book submitted.
updates_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: i have a book of maps for the united states and i have always been able to update the travel atlas and supplement that with free maps from the internet via google, yahoo, etc.
sound_ipod_nano_8gb: long battery life, sleek compact, easy to set up, reliable performance, great sound, lots of storage bought it for the gym and it was just the right weight.
service_swissotel_hotel_chicago: the concierge gave us erroneous info about the navy pier trolley the maid failed to replace toiletries and towels, despite a $3 tip that had been left. i normally tip $1, 2 per day and wait until the day we leave to tip the maid.
quality_toyota_camry_2007: i love the design, the poor components, sub, par fit, and, finish, poor quality control, and unreliable work on the part of dealership techs will make me question the quality of any future toyota vehicle.
food_holiday_inn_london: the buffet breakfast is ok although not the best i've had. the food in the ground floor restaurant is good. within 200 yards of leaving the hotel and heading to the tube station you have a number of fast food outlets, highstreet restautants, pastry shops and supermarkets.
rooms_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: i stayed here for 2 nights in march, i was concermed by the number of comments regarding the size of the rooms. i found them to be more than adequate and very family friendly particularly liked the lock on the mini bar fridge door which housed a seemingly endless supply of candy.
eyesight-issues_amazon_kindle: reading on the kindle screen really is pleasant and natural. e, ink and matte screen, no harsh computer, screen look to it does not fatigue my eyes at all, and the matte helps reduce glare from light bulbs and the sun.
transmission_toyota_camry_2007: the transmission is horrible, it shifts revs horribly at the wrong times, it putters when it hits 1 1 2 rpms while coasting unless you rev it or hit the breaks. if you try to start the car in really cold weather it makes a horrible grinding noise, the dash rattles all the time, when it does move it revs even after take your foot from the gas.
staff_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: tuscan inn staff were very polite and helpful, loved the large lobby area with the large fireplace. staff were very polite and helpful, loved the large lobby area with the large fireplace.
directions_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: daughter dearest now carries the nuvi in the glove box of her car, pulling it out, plugging it in, and getting directions whenever she needs.
video_ipod_nano_8gb: 5g lies a more mature ipod, many steps wiser and more able than its one, year, old the ipod gains many incremental improvements. the tantalizing price points are $249 for the 30gb version and $349 for the huge 80gb version.
bathroom_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the hotel isn't a luxury property, but they have some nice touches like marble bathrooms, mini bar, room service and an evening wine reception every day.
satellite_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: if you've ever had a brand x gps take you on a strange route that adds 20 minutes to your trip, has you turn the wrong way down a one way road, often loses the satellite signal, or has old maps missing streets, you know how important this stuff is.
price_holiday_inn_london: ny, london flight left london for a twin and not a double bedded room. the hotel really tries, dont nit pick small things, dont pay more than $120 max. if you want to at least check out other reliable hotels, there are many shockers at all price ranges.
interior_honda_accord_2008: the car has a 268 hp engine which provides plenty of power for passing. yet the car gets 31 to 33 mpg the interior of the car is well laid out. the interior of the car is well laid out and the controls and gauges are easy to read.
mileage_honda_accord_2008: i just purchased my lx, p a couple of weeks ago. i was really surprised at how much i like this car, going from a big v to a 4 is a change but the power is good, gas mileage is great.
comfort_honda_accord_2008: the accord model has a great balance of features that blends attractive styling, driveablity, build quality, economy, and comfort with all the loaded options that i will enjoy over several years and 100000 from the hard and uncomfortable driver seat.
staff_swissotel_chicago: no more bathrobes in corner rooms suites coffee service in room is parred way down the buffet offered in room is not as bountiful. the cafe staff is inpeccable and extremely gracious and will bring you what you wish check in staff not at all eager to upgrade you, even though you may be a frequent visitor.
screen_ipod_nano_8gb: 5g lies a more mature ipod, many steps wiser and more able than its one, year, old the ipod gains many incremental improvements. the tantalizing price points are $249 for the 30gb version and $349 for the huge 80gb version.
speed_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: garmin's route is 40 mins shorter on a 7 hour drive because it chooses shorter route along minor highways instead of longer route along i, 70 with higher speed limit. if you are driving in nyc or other major city, be prepared to add 1 minute for each red traffic light.
size_asus_netbook_1005ha: the small size makes it very easy to carry compared to a standard laptop. the long battery life is really great, and the speed and performance using various wi, fi connections was better than i expected it to be.
display_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: i finally got the nuvi 255w after months of analizing and comparing wit other brands. the new display posts speed limit signs of major roads flush left on the screen. the widescreen display makes it possible to distinguish between which road to turn on when there are two streets on your right that are only one house apart.
gas_mileage_toyota_camry_2007: i bought this camry three weeks ago, acceleration is a major problem, just not like the older models of camry, was in a crash, hit on the front side, right fender, car was considered total loss, not fixable. overall i like the camry for its large trunk space, sporty look, the metallic red paint, reliability and low maintenance, toyota warranty, toyota dealer service department and better
service_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the hotel is conveniently located to the shopping centre across the road. a coffee tea biscotti service was open from 6am till 9am in the mornings.
battery-life_ipod_nano_8gb: 5g lies a more mature ipod, many steps wiser and more able than its one, year, old the ipod gains many incremental improvements. but probably the most appealing aspect is the tantalizing price points of $249 for the 30gb version and $349 for the huge 80gb version.
performance_netbook_1005ha: the eee super hybrid engine utility lets users overclock or underclock their eee pc's to boost performance or provide better battery life depending on their immediate requirements. amazon seems to be concerned that i am simply experiencing performance or compatibility problems.
voice_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: i'm really glad i bought it though, and like the easy to read graphics, the voice used to tell you the name of the street you are to turn on, the uncannily accurate estimates of mileage and time of arrival at your destination.
battery-life_netbook_1005ha: it becomes possible to do productive work on the asus eee ha1005. the small size makes it very easy to carry compared to a standard laptop. it boots up quickly, especially after getting rid of the extra asus software that auto, boots at startup.
battery-life_amazon_kindle: the kindle is an out of the box reading, ready unit that immediately addressed me by my nickname, no log, in necessary. the kindle does not come with a uk power adaptor, so that has been an extra 12 expense.
screen_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the text to speech is great for not having to look down at the screen endangering yourself and others on the road. after the voice updates the garmin put out for the 255w the scratchiness and robotic sounding voice became crisp and very audible.
keyboard_netbook_1005ha: it boots up quickly, especially after getting rid of the extra asus software that auto, boots at startup, its battery life is phenomenal. the light weight, the battery life, the keyboard, the non, protruding removable battery, the bright screen, the track pad disable button and general ease of use makes it hard to beat.
comfort_toyota_camry_2007: i've read other reviews stating that the leather seats were not comfortable for long drives due to lack of cushion support. but that's not been case for me especially after recently driving from houston to key west, fla.
screen_netbook_1005ha: the netbook is heavy near the hinge because that's where the battery is located and you have to put your hand on the bottom chassis so that the netbook doesn't tip over. the screen doesn't bend all the way backwards which can be annoy, otherwise this is a really nice netbook.
interior_toyota_camry_2007: flimsy steering wheel switch gear, less padding in seats, only a 2, way power passenger seat, plastic covered board for seat, back map pockets, baby, puke yellow fake wood trim, etc.
room_holiday_inn_london: good size considered it is in london, comfy double bed, clean in room, tea coffee choc making facilities, hairdryer under desk, old tv, toilet facilities was disgusting. cheap plastic canteen cups on wash basin, only one tiny hand soap, no supply of essential basic vanity kits only available if ask.
free_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the hotel's evening wine hour and morning's biscotti hour also distinguish the property as a cut above. a courtesy upgrade got us a fine meeting space with free internet, which even impressed our boss.
buttons_amazon_kindle: things like the buttons that made it easy to accidentally turn pages the separate cursor on the side that could only select lines and was sometimes hard to see the occasionally awkward menus the case which practically forced you to remove it to use it.
accuracy_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the only glitch i have found so far is that the speed limits are not 100% accurate, although the gps, amazingly, is able to very accurately tell you how fast your vehicle is moving.
fonts_amazon_kindle: the kindle does not recognize page numbers, since they would change radically when you change font size. amazon provides the notion of location which is display independent.
rooms_swissotel_chicago: the cafe staff is inpeccable and extremely gracious and will bring you what you wish check in staff not at all eager to upgrade you. we had a pretty bad view on the 27th floor relative to the other rooms which faced lake michigan there's some construction right now southwards.
parking_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the hotel, located a few blocks from fisherman's wharf as well as ghiardelli square, has a nice italian theme that carries into the lobby as well as the uniforms for the parking valets.
food_swissotel_chicago: bockwinkels is a well stocked mini grocery 2 blocks south and 1 block east on street level for snacks, drinks and all kinds of deli prepared foods. the lobby bar does not serve food very late at night and we couldn't find any vending machines for soda or snacks.
service_holiday_inn_london: gloucester rd tube station is close to hyde park for a run walk in summer, is close to hyde park for a run walk in summer. a mini tesco for groceries, a larger grocery store plenty of internet cafe's, a paul's boulangerie right by the tube, great fro a quick breakfast, the gloucester road tube stop is a
location_holiday_inn_london: the hotel is just a block from the gloucester rd tube station, which connects to heathrow. it's only about a block from the gloucester rd tube station, which is on the picadilly line that connects to heathrow.
